content: cute pumpkin free crochet pattern by esther s hands materials worsted weight yarn 4 2 colours 3 75 mm crochet hook poly-fil stuffing tapestry needle scissors abbreviations chain - chain st - stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet scblo - single_crochet back loop only hdcblo - half_double_crochet back loop only size ca 4 x 2 pattern chain 21 row 1 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in next chain half_double_crochet in each of the next 16 chain single_crochet in each of the last 2 chain chain 1 turn 20 row 2-23 scblo in each of the first 2 sts hdcblo in each of the next 16 sts scblo in each of the last 2 sts chain 1 turn 20 row 24 scblo in each of the first 2 sts hdcblo in each of the next 16 sts scblo in each of the last 2 sts continue with seaming page 3 stem in a magic_ring single_crochet 8 join with slip_stitch chain 1 8 round 1 2 single_crochet in each st join with slip_stitch 16 do not finish off chain 8 slip_stitch in the 2nd chain from the hook and in the next 3 chain finish off cut yarn leaving a long tail pull the stem through the center of the circle see pictures on page 4 esther s hands ©copyright 2024 facebook/instagram @esthershands seaming fold your rectangle to line up the two shorter edges and slip_stitch them together fasten_off leaving a long tail turn your piece right side out so the slip stitched seam is on the inside using the tapestry needle seam the open part by weaving your needle in and out along the single_crochet stitches gather tightly fasten_off cut yarn stuff the pumpkin do not overstuff gather the top with the thread the same way as the bottom pull the yarn tight with the needle go back and forth from top to bottom a few times so you get the desired pumpkin shape weave on the stem and enjoy your cute little pumpkin esther s hands ©copyright 2024 facebook/instagram @esthershands esther s hands ©copyright 2024 facebook/instagram @esthershands
